<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Thaumaturge](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=186)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 49

Scraps of knowledge have taught you how to exploit the vulnerabilities of creatures and the powers of mystical objects.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="3">Multiclass Thaumaturge Characters</title>

Thaumaturge suits characters who want to glean strange knowledge. It's especially useful for those who tend to fight with one-handed weapons, like [swashbucklers](/Classes.aspx?ID=15) or [rogues](/Classes.aspx?ID=10), since they have their other hand free for an implement.

<document level="2" id="feat-3743" />
